data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Boumerdès, Algeria so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Boumerdès, Algeria

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Boumerdès, Algeria and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary: On average, 43 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Boumerdès, Algeria.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Boumerdès do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 547 believers in Boumerdès to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 801,553 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Bedouin, Ruarha people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, please give the 547 believers in the state of Boumerdès the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Boumerdès, Algeria.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Boumerdès, Algeria has a population of 802,100.

We estimate Boumerdès has 547 people who might know Jesus, 66 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 801,487 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,466 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Boumerdès, Algeria.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
